fields.name: MPROT3
fields.description: Master 3 Priviledge, Buffer, Read, Write Control.

enumeratedValues.name: MPL0
enumeratedValues.description: Accesses from this master are forced to user-mode (ips_supervisor_access is forced to zero) regardless of the hprot[1] access attribute.

enumeratedValues.name: MPL1
enumeratedValues.description: Accesses from this master are not forced to user-mode. The hprot[1] access attribute is used directly to determine ips_supervisor_access.

fields.name: MPROT2
fields.description: Master 2 Priviledge, Buffer, Read, Write Control

enumeratedValues.name: MPL1
enumeratedValues.description: Accesses from this master are not forced to user-mode. The hprot[1] access attribute is used directly to determine ips_supervisor_access.

fields.name: MPROT1
fields.description: Master 1 Priviledge, Buffer, Read, Write Control

enumeratedValues.name: MPL0
enumeratedValues.description: Accesses from this master are forced to user-mode (ips_supervisor_access is forced to zero) regardless of the hprot[1] access attribute.

enumeratedValues.name: MPL1
enumeratedValues.description: Accesses from this master are not forced to user-mode. The hprot[1] access attribute is used directly to determine ips_supervisor_access.

fields.name: MPROT0
fields.description: Master 0 Priviledge, Buffer, Read, Write Control

enumeratedValues.name: MPL0
enumeratedValues.description: Accesses from this master are forced to user-mode (ips_supervisor_access is forced to zero) regardless of the hprot[1] access attribute.

enumeratedValues.name: MPL1
enumeratedValues.description: Accesses from this master are not forced to user-mode. The hprot[1] access attribute is used directly to determine ips_supervisor_access.

enumeratedValues.name: TP0
enumeratedValues.description: Accesses from an untrusted master are allowed.

enumeratedValues.name: TP1
enumeratedValues.description: Accesses from an untrusted master are not allowed. If an access is attempted by an untrusted master, the access is terminated with an error response and no peripheral access is initiated on the IPS bus.
